Description: Stamp (vessel): mikyala. Measure of shelled lentils. Six line inscription. Fragment of rim attached. Made of olive-green glass.
Curator's comments: From the same die: Balog, P. 1976. ‘Ummayad, ʿAbbasid and Ṭūlūnid glass weights and vessel-stamps’. New York, 374.
Bibliographic references: Morton 1985 / A Catalogue of Early Islamic Glass Stamps (210)
